course_name: Negotiation and Conflict Management in Resource Management
description:
This course is only offered ODD years. A conceptual framework of conflict at the interpersonal, intra-group and inter-group level that will enable students to improve their conflict management skills. The focus will be on processes and skills that will improve individual and team negotiating competence and confidence. (Minimum enrolment required 15) 
Internal: internal students enrolled [based] at Gatton campus should enrol in this mode.
Intensive: external [off-campus] students, and students normally based at St Lucia campus, should enrol in this mode.
